predicate.note: Frames file for 'glaze' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 24.

example.name: the other example
example.text: John likes *trace* to glaze donuts in his spare time.

example.name: the one example
example.text: The approach worked well in the recent antitrust case in which Energy Transportation Systems Inc. sued Santa Fe Pacific Corp. over the transport of semi-liquefied coal -- the kind of case likely to make almost anyone's eyes glaze over.
